h3_title: Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - Tiger’s Acolyte
content: A follower of the Tiger Vanguard, the strange man will call out for his missing son before violently attacking you. And just like his master, he’s incredibly ferocious, and it can be hard to anticipate his attacks, let alone whether he’ll attack with his very long sword or very long claws.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Yellow_Sand_Formation_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Yellow Sand Formation Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Windrest Hamlet' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - Tiger’s Acolyte'.
The content is as follows:
A follower of the Tiger Vanguard, the strange man will call out for his missing son before violently attacking you. And just like his master, he’s incredibly ferocious, and it can be hard to anticipate his attacks, let alone whether he’ll attack with his very long sword or very long claws.
